com.rohitsood.urlybird.launcher
Class ServerLauncher

java.lang.Object
  com.rohitsood.urlybird.launcher.ServerLauncher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Launcher
class ServerLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
implements Launcher

Launches the application in "server" mode. Reads the suncertify.properties file This automatically starts the RMI registry. It binds the DatabaseNetworkServerFactory registry.

Version:
1.1
Author:
Rohit Sood

Constructor Detail

ServerLauncher

ServerLauncher()
Method Detail

launch

public void launch()
Launches the server. Reads the configuration file settings. Sets the location of the codebase to the jar runtime. Sets system properties for codebase location, policy file location. Starts the registry and rebinds the server factory implementation.

Specified by:
launch in interface Launcher

debug

private void debug(java.lang.String msg)
Prints debug statements on the console for development and bug fixes.

Parameters:
msg - The message to print to the console.

startRegistry

private void startRegistry()
Attempts to locate a current registry and export it. Then attempts to create a new registry and export that.

rebind

private void rebind()
Binds the factory object to the registry. If the binding already exists it rebinds it.
